jobs.title: Content Developer
jobs.description:
ABOUT US:

MASSOLIT (https://www.massolit.io) is a fast-growing, funded education technology start-up based in London, UK.

We work with university academics to create high-quality, curriculum-linked video lectures for use in secondary schools in the UK and overseas.

We are currently used by more than 200 schools in the UK and overseas – including the United States, China, Australia and the Middle East.

Last year, more than 75,000 students from around the globe used our videos to learn. That’s a lot of people – but we’re only just getting started.


ABOUT THE ROLE:

We’re looking for a Content Developer to help us create brilliant new video content for the site, either within our existing subjects (English Literature, History, Classics, Philosophy) or within new subjects.

The main responsibilities of this role include:

– Working on aspects of curriculum design
– Identifying and contacting expert academics to create content
– Filming and editing footage


WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR:

We’re looking for someone with passion for (online) teaching and learning, boundless enthusiasm for an academic subject, an eye for detail, and a willingness to learn.

If you’ve got teaching experience (especially at secondary school level) that would be a big plus, but it is not required.

Don’t worry if you don’t know anything about filming. We can teach you that – and you’ll end up with an ability to shoot and edit to an industry-leading standard.


WHAT WE’LL GIVE YOU:

We’ll give you a competitive salary, bonus, paid holiday, and a piece of the company you can call your own. 

We would be willing to make this a part-time position for the right candidate.


OTHER INFORMATION:

Should you need any further details on the role, please contact Chris Tudor (Founder) at chris@massolit.io
